A Bit About Me

I am a designer & client-side developer. I spend most of my time writing HTML/5, CSS/3 and JavaScript to integrate new and existing sites with Joomla CMS using a content-first, responsive design approach.

Currently, I'm working on a pet project named Habbla, that I hope will benefit the web community.
